live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
47015.summary: Some customers in the McKenzie Lake area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47015.title: Feb 21 – Calgary (McKenzie Lake) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
